snippet: The announcement extended the company’s program to remove certain ingredients from baby products to include adult products.
abstract: Johnson & Johnson announces plans to remove a host of potentially harmful chemicals, like formaldehyde, from its line of personal care products by the end of 2015; company had already pledged to remove certain chemicals from its baby products by 2013, but the latest announcement extends the program to its adult products.
lead_paragraph: The announcement extended the company’s program to remove certain ingredients from baby products to include adult products.

headline.seo: Johnson & Johnson to Remove Questionable Chemicals in Products
headline.main: Johnson & Johnson to Remove Formaldehyde From Products
headline.print_headline: Johnson & Johnson to Remove Questionable Chemicals in Products
